::CyberShark::

    He got the message from the one calling himself "Galvat=
ron" But he really had no time for this.

e said. "Until then, I'm after, well I guess Primal Prime, Ironic isn't it?=
"

altron's spark ached. "Kluster something has happened. I must go." He took =
of out of the ship. He saw a transformer very deistraught. "I know what has=
 happened. I can help you. You must trust me. Will you accept my help. It m=
ay help if you knew who I was. I was galvatron."

de85@...> wrote: 











    ::CyberShark::





        He be=
gan to cry. He finally found a CR Chamber and lowered her inside. His now c=
rimson eyes were tear filled when he pushed the button for repair.


      =
  "I love you too," He left the room and went outside the CF. "Kluster, or =
any Maximal on the CF, please notify me once Battera is out of the CR Chamb=
er, I'm going to kill, well, I don't know his name."


        He went out,=
 and with his low power reserves he really shouldn't have. But he soon caug=
ht up to a wolfish bot.


        "Are you CyberShark?" It asked.


       =
 "Yes, what are you after?" CyberShark asked, sensing a quest in this bot.
=


        "I'm after Primal Prime."


        "What?! Why? He is a Maximal,=
 like you," CyberShark said.


        "Not anymore, I can smell the stench=
 of evil on him." Eclipse said.


        "On Optimus Prime? I can't believ=
e it." CyberShark said as he sped past him and after Dark Prime.

dy.

 her 
      eyes and passed out, laying on her side, in a growing puddle of=
 mech 
      fluid.
